This happens often with Amazon clothing that I have purchased.  It is too small.  I am not sure why this continues to be an issue after so many years but underwear, shirts, bathing suits, shorts and pants purchased from a seller in China are a gamble as to size and fit.  This is so regrettable.I have decided to refrain from purchasing any more clothes from Amazon until all sellers make clothes that fit in the American market.  I know that when I go to a department store and purchase my regular size, whatever I purchase will fit.  I no longer believe that is possible with Amazon.

评论概述: Size chart is INACCURATE (unless you wear kids' sizes)
评论详情: I regret to say that this is yet another company with killer styles, visually, but is meant for Asian body fit. This, of course, is not mentioned on the page. I was really excited about this product. I'd learned from past online clothing purchase mistakes, to quadruple-check the interpretation and accuracy of the size chart. I thought it safe to order an XL (US) since my usual size is Large... just in case. Since the size chart said "XL (US)", I didn't want to be stuck with an oversized item by ordering a larger size. As it turned out - not unexpectedly, this garment fits like a Medium -- and that might be stretching it (NO pun). I blame myself for this purchase because I'd ordered from companies before with a similar style of clothing at such a good price. I knew better, but chanced it anyway. Also, the garment feels a bit fragile. I'm confused as to how I would wash it without it falling apart or being ruined anyway. The material combination can't really be dry-cleaned. I consider it a lesson learned. No more mail ordering from unfamiliar clothing companies I have no history with, and that have no return policy. I really could've saved the money.

I ordered a mens large, and it was the correct size. I was worried about the bands on the sleeves being loose, but it's fine once the shirt is on. They're just not tacked down. The shirt looks excellent on my son, who is delighted with this shirt. We bought a second one immediately because he likes it so much.
